title: Esther O'Reilly, Jordan Peterson, Rachel Held Evans, Humanism, Thomas Kinkade
description:
My second talk with Esther. She talked for the first 17 minutes straight until I started feeling colonized. After that there was more back and forth. See the notes below for some topics

Book, 
Humanism
JBP: Why you need art in your life video
Thomas kinkade
Joseph Conrad
Canticle for Leibowitz
JBP Maps of Meaning rehabilitation of the woman and her dog
Rachel held evans Rod Dreher

Her blog on Patheos https://www.patheos.com/blogs/youngfogey/

Her work on Quillette https://quillette.com/author/esther-oreilly/

Her work on the Federalist https://thefederalist.com/author/esther-oreilly/

Her YouTube Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCniX3x-I8foCHeXts2LYKOA


Playlist Esther wanted linked: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P10zAJ7OiDg&list=PLKrwKcXoZEzLoTEYrR5fdpo0_VlD07fja 

Her talk with John Wood Jr. on salvation 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hFQD40vptaM&

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo 
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin Cash (BCH) qr3amdmj3n2u83eqefsdft9vatnj9na0dqlzhnx80h 
To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://beta.lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

You can donate to Living Stones CRC to support this work here http://www.livingstonescrc.org/donate 
Donations may be tax deductible for taxpayers of the United States
